resources.string: Mena Garden: History and Tradition in the Heart of Nerja
Mena Garden is not just a restaurant; it is a place with a deep history rooted in the tradition of Nerja.

Our establishment stands on the foundations of the legendary Hostal Mena (or Pensión Mena), a tourist landmark that pioneered the region with over 50 years of activity. The hostel occupied a building dating from the 18th century (1700), an architectural gem of Andalusian essence.

The most distinctive element, which today gives our venue its name, was its extraordinary surroundings: more than 1,000 m² of exotic gardens overlooking the cliff, offering an oasis of peace in the center of the town.
Today, we have transformed this rich heritage into a modern space, preserving the authenticity and Andalusian spirit, and keeping that tranquil garden alive.
When you visit us, you will not only enjoy the best gastronomy on Calle El Barrio, but you will also connect with an essential and distinguished part of Nerja's tourist history.
